Anything from Xetalim?

Anything from Xetalim?

No. Does someone else wanna launch theirs?
AFAIK that only leaves Sirine.
Deathsoul if you want you can launch up my bit

Well, I think I'm gonna do a rule change. I set stations limited to 8 modules, I'm gonna up that to a set number of launch payloads rather than modules, and change the number out to 10. That will then cycle everyone and will allow more stuff to be added provided you aren't asking for an 80 ton heavy lift.

If you need an SLS to orbit it, you might want to trim the weight some.

Good to see this is almost done. Once it is, I'll have a badge ready for Monopropellant, certainly a worthy signature trophy for successfully running that.

@AverageJoe

I cant launch anything for a few hours as I am at school, but I should be able to launch it when I get home. Which is the module you were sending?

@Cap'n

Does this affect the part limits or base construction? So could I send three low part count modules in one, and then unpack them into a major part of the base?
Just PM'd Sirine/Xetalim. Waiting on replies. Interesting rule changes, seems better for expansion.

Check the google doc for more updates.

@ Deathsoul - I was sending up the expansion truss.
Hey all. I've been away for a few day for Chinese New Year. So, anyone please give me ideal on whats going on. and Im ready for the mission.

Okay, I am back, starting up KSP while I am writing this.

EDIT:I can't load the ships, I can however launch from the launchpad and revert to vehicle assembly, but when I add a launcher, I can't launch.

KSP freezes after I click the launch button.

@ Sirine

The first mission is almost done. I think my launch will be sent by Deathsoul and I have no clue who is currently working. It looks like no one is currently launching so whoever jumps on it first will launch.

@ everyone

I hope to get this finished up by this Thursday. This project has been running for like 2+ weeks now due to many different problems, but it's about time for it to close I think. The station I'm betting is looking really cool now!

@ Xetalim + everyone

I had that problem before. I'm guessing that that save is busted. You may need to uninstall KSP and re install completely. Also if the save is broken, we may need to use Monopropellant's hyperedited save of the station.
